biotools.summary: MAMBO (Metabolomic Analysis of Metagenomes using fBa and Optimization) is an algorithm which assesses and optimizes correlations between genome-scale, constraint-based metabolic models and microbial abundance profiles obtained from shotgun sequence data.

bioschemas.name: MAMBO
bioschemas.summary: MAMBO (Metabolomic Analysis of Metagenomes using fBa and Optimization) is an algorithm which assesses and optimizes correlations between genome-scale, constraint-based metabolic models and microbial abundance profiles obtained from shotgun sequence data.
